channel.title: Vote Command Timer
channel.description: I got a command called ::ivoted that gives 10M to people, I want to add a timer so it can onyl be used each 24 hours, what do I add to add a timer?

item.title: Vote Command Timer
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:8, topic:407146”]Can you just use the search bar?
I answered this the other day.[/quote]
Some people are against doing work…:\

@OP:
Seriously. Just look at the timer code then look at your vote code. combine them till it works. Programming is actually doing work, not just copy and pasting.

item.title: Vote Command Timer
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

I got 100 errors when compiling, can you just add the 24 hour timer to my command?

		if (playerCommand.equals("ivoted")) {
                            c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000);
					c.sendMessage("Thanks for voting, enjoy your 10M");
                                    }

Read full topic

item.title: Vote Command Timer
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

Unless the command does not check the username for who voted, then you cannot do it.

This is html coding. You need a website and then you need to make a Vote4Cash thing…

Plenty of tutorials.

You obviously made no effort in searching for this.

I searched this in google and clicked on the first link.

                        if (playerCommand.startsWith("command")) {
                                if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastCommand > 86,400,000) { //If the lastCommand timer is greater than 86,400,000 milliseconds (24 hours Seconds)
                                        c.lastCommand = System.currentTimeMillis(); //Resets the lastCommand timer
                        c.sendMessage("You may use this command once every 24 hours."); //Sends a message
                                                        
                                                } else { 
                        c.sendMessage("Sorry, But you must wait 24 hours before using this command again!");
                                }
                        }

Just modify that ^^ to give cash. If you need help with that reply saying that you do…

Read full topic
